author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Coterie International (S) Pte Ltd v MAE Engineering Ltd
counsel: Anna Oei (Oei and Charles) for plaintiff; Eric Chew Yee Teck and Janet Chong Yean Yoong (Archilex Law Corporation) for defendant
tags: Contract/Mistake/Recovery of money paid under mistake
tags-parsed: Contract/Breach/Plaintiff claiming for various bonuses under contract/Whether entitled to 13th-month bonus/Whether entitled to incentive bonus/Whether incentive scheme rescinded by plaintiff's letter

Contract/Breach/Defendant counterclaiming for damages for plaintiff's breach of termination clause -Whether plaintiff entitled to treat contract as at an end/Whether plaintiff in breach of termination clause
Contract/Mistake/Recovery of money paid under mistake/Whether defendant entitled to recover payout to plaintiff on the ground of its mistaken belief that targets met
